aligned:
\begin{aligned}
\rho &=\arsh\sqrt{\frac{1}{4A}\left (e^{\pm 2\sqrt A(\tau +\tau _0)}+
(B^2-4AC)e^{\mp 2\sqrt A (\tau +\tau _0)}\right )-\frac{B}{2A}}~,
\\
t&=\pm \arctan\left (\frac{e^{\pm 2\sqrt A(\tau +\tau _0)}+2A-B}{2b\sqrt A}\right )~+~t_0~,\\
f&=\pm \arctan\left (\frac{e^{\pm 2\sqrt A(\tau +\tau _0)}-B}{2\tilde b\sqrt{A}}\right )~+~f_0~,
\

\begin{aligned}
x^+&=\frac{1}{2}\left (\arctan\big (\frac{B(\tau +\tau _0)}{b}\big )~
+~t_0~+~\psi\right )~,\\
x^-&=\frac{R^2}{2}\left (\arctan\big (\frac{B(\tau +\tau _0)}{b}\big )~
+~t_0~-~\psi\right )~,\\
r&=R~\arsh\sqrt{B(\tau +\tau _0)^2-\frac{C}{B}}~,\\
f&=\arctan\big (\frac{B(\tau +\tau _0)}{\tilde b}\big )~
+~f_0~,\\
y&=R~\theta ~.
\

\begin{aligned}
x^+&=\frac{x^-}{R^2}~+~\psi ~,\\
r&=R~\arsh\sqrt{\frac{\tan ^2(\frac{2x^-}{R^2}-t_0+\psi )~+~\frac{\tilde b^2}{b^2}}{1~-~\frac{\tilde b^2}{b^2}}}~,\\
f&=f_0~+~\arctan\left (\frac{b}{\tilde b}\tan\big (\frac{2x^-}{R^2}-t_0+\psi \big )\right )~,\\
y&=R~\theta ~.
\
